title: Teacher Orchestration Strategies in Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning (CSCL) Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Core principles of collaborative learning, science curriculum content knowledge, and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Training for in-service secondary science teachers, involving hands-on environment setup using multi-display classrooms and portable dashboard equipment

learning_goals: Real-time learning analytics tools can monitor participation levels and task progress of collaborative learning groups
Deviation between CSCL lesson design scripts and actual class implementation can be analyzed to establish adjustment strategies
Text notifications from learning analytics dashboards can identify students' potential misconceptions and apply immediate feedback strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
